ygData.subject: Re: It's Battle Time
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine again crossed his claws to defend himself but the plasma blast had more kick than the former shots he d blocked. The blast knocked him off his feat

Lunarpine again crossed his claws to defend himself but the plasma blast had
more kick than the former shots he'd blocked. The blast knocked him off his
feat and he shot through the air propelled by the recoil. He hit the ground
hard fealing the dents and scrapes forming. "Guess that'll teach me to block
everything, " The bot thought as he pushed himself to his feat. Again he
started after Serpentor goading him as he moved. "Whats the matter swine? Do
you only fight females and wounded bots?" he growled softly as he made his
insults.
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 5:18 PM
Subject: It's Battle Time


> (Sorry, Soulstice, the CR chambers aren't functioning in the Cybertronian
> Fire.  They were deactivated, and all energy from them was rerouted into
the
> Maximal shields)
>
>
> The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Double
> Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Ares/Serpentor/Chordate/Nemesis
> Enforcer/Scattershot:
>
>
>
>
> Dark One rolled through the air like nothing, dodging all the nails.  "I
grow
> weary of this pathetic excuse for a battle." he laughed, launching down
two
> energy-signature seeking missiles, followed by 25 rapid laser blasts, all
> heading for Torca.
>
> ---
>
> Breakdown flipped, two nails digging into a thigh.  He fired off a grenade
at
> Torca, followed by an arc of sonic energy from his sonic blaster.
>
> ---
>
> Pyro was now driving full speed, one missile erupting behind him, leaving
a
> dirt filled crater, the other hitting him in the back.  He pulled to a
stop,
> firing off three fireballs at Sky Lynx, and turning his entire form, two
> slots sliding up, revealing missile launchers.
>
> Both seeking missiles launched off at Sky Lynx, tracking his energy
signature.
>
> ---
>
> Hiss pulled out a grenade and pressed a button, setting it to blow on
impact,
> autogun fire grazing the side of his head.  He threw the grenade at the
CF,
> getting a direct hit, blowing apart three of the remaining six autoguns,
> quickly firing a fusion blast to blow apart an EMP cannon before it could
> fire upon him.
>
> ---
>
> Scavenger ducked under most of Ratchet's shots, some striking him in the
> chest, almost knocking him off balance.  He replied with 25 rounds heading
> for Ratchet, followed by 20 rapid optic blasts.
>
> ---
>
> Sixshot felt the blade explode against his armored form and laughed,
firing
> off two blasts from his cannon in his tank mode off at Ratchet.
>
> ---
>
> Demon Wulf let all 25 blasts hit his chest, and let out a howl.  He raised
a
> palm, firing off a powerful purple blast off at Sidewswipe, followed by
three
> crimson optic blasts.
>
> ---
>
> Flesh Ripper heard his brother yell, and fired off twenty-five rapid laser
> bolts from his rifle at Sideswipe.
>
> ---
>
> Dark Claw drove at the Cybertronian Fire, launching two more missiles, one
> blowing up against the hull of the CF, another blowing up against the
shields
> which now only slightly blocked shots.
>
> ---
>
> Double Punch fired off an optic blast, intercepting the incoming missile.
He
> went at a jog forward, firing one energy-signature seeking missile from
his
> left pincher at Orion, and firing off one other energy-signature seeking
> missile at Prowl, who he saw join the battle.
>
> ---
>
> Injector flew downward, the missile going by him, the shock wave of it
> slightly injuring his back.  He raised both arms, firing off eight stinger
> missiles, four from each launcher, at Orion.
>
> ---
>
> Bumblebee flipped in the air, being thrown slightly by the exploding
missile.
>  He fired down four stinger missiles at Orion from his left launcher, and
> another four  towards Sky Lynx.
>
> ---
>
> Manterror dodged the incoming missile, but was hit in the back by Kluster,
> and flew forward.  He regained his balance in mid-air, and turned, firing
> down six ion disks at the commander of the Cybertronian Fire, firing three
> disks from both arms.
>
> ---
>
> The missile exploded against Ares' armor, which was starting to fail.  He
> raised all four of his cannons to point at a single target.  "Now you've
made
> me mad."
>
> He fired four powerful blasts from each cannon, sixteen blasts in all
heading
> straight for Sky Lynx.
>
> ---
>
> Serpentor laughed as Lunaprine made his challenge clear.  "How about no?"
he
> asked, raising his left arm, firing off a blast from his plasma launcher
at
> Lunaprine.
> (NOTE: Plasma launcher is similar to missile launcher, only with plasma
> energy)
>
> ---
>
> Nemesis Enforcer outstretched his leathery looking wings and took flight,
> heading for Prowl.  "Time to die!" he yelled, firing off 10 rapid blasts
from
> his rapid-firing laser rifle at the Maximal.
>
> ---
>
> Scattershot lifted off into the air, picking out a four foot long and four
> foot wide bomb from subspace and arming it.  "I've got, high hopes, in the
> skyyyyy hopes!" he laughed manically, throwing the bomb down towards the
CF.
>
> ===
>
> Chordate regained his composure, trying to not feel his face.  Mech-fluid
> almost completely blocked his view as he walked over to the main console
> which was completely fried.  "SLAG IT!" he yelled, slamming a fist down on
> the console, as Scattershot's bomb exploded against the shields.  The
> explosion sent Chordate slamming to the ground, hitting his elbow hard
which
> internally shattered.
>
> Chordate layed on his back, checking the his internal comptuer which was
> linked with the Cybertronian Fire's.  The shields were down to twelve
> percent.  Only two autoguns, and three EMP cannons remained.  Four missile
> launchers remained, wtih ten armed missiles each.  There were also several
> small hull breaches that though no one could fit through, if worked on
they
> would be breached.
>
> He decided to take a risky venture, and ordered the CF to fire two
missiles
> from each launcher in a widespread.
>
> ---
>
> The missile launchers armed, firing off two missiles each in a widespread
> pattern that would cover the ENTIRE battle field in flames, only those in
the
> air would be spared.
>
> Chordate collapsed, not going into stasis lock or death, but just laying
> there, not knowing what more to do.
>
>
>
>
